node.title: Recent Commercial Real Estate Transactions
node.alt: This 5,181-square-foot building in Midtown was built in 1915.
node.description: Recent commercial real estate transactions in New York.
node.content: ["$4 MILLION", "50 West 27th Street (between Avenue of the Americas and Broadway)", "Manhattan", "Built in 1915, this four-story, 5,181-square-foot building in Midtown includes a ground-floor retail space and three floor-through office lofts. All units were delivered vacant.", "Buyer: Asim Rashid", "Seller: Arnold Morak Estate", "Broker: Tom Brady of Douglas Elliman", "$38.50/SQ. FT.", "$207,130 approximate annual rent", "146 West 29th Street (between Avenue of the Americas and Seventh Avenue)", "Manhattan", "Uriu Nuance, an interior design and finish company, signed a five-year lease for 5,380 square feet of office space on the sixth floor of the India Building in Midtown. The previous tenant, ABC Language Exchange, occupied the space for 10 years before shutting down during the pandemic.", "Tenant: Uriu Nuance", "Tenant\u2019s Broker: James Brennan of Bond New York Properties", "Landlord: Teresharan", "$1.5 MILLION", "33 Water Street (between Bay and Front Streets)", "Staten Island", "This 12,750-square-foot development site in the Stapleton Heights neighborhood is a plot of land that can be developed into a mixed-use or residential property. When the property\u2019s current owner bought the space in 2018, the site hosted a building with apartments above a live-jazz bar.", "Seller: LiBVentures", "Brokers: Adelaide Polsinelli and Jake Rosen of Compass"]
